billEvents.eventText: referred to consumer affairs and protection

title: Relates to certain labelling requirements when substitute drug products are dispensed
summary: Requires the brand name of a prescribed drug to be indicated on the label when substitute drug products are dispensed.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3840

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 28, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. BUTLER -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Consumer Affairs and Protection

       AN  ACT  to amend the education law, in relation to certain requirements
         when substitute drug products are dispensed

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Paragraph  (c)  of subdivision 1 of section 6816-a of the
    2  education law, as added by chapter 776 of the laws of 1977,  is  amended
    3  to read as follows:
    4    (c)  The pharmacist shall indicate on the label affixed to the immedi-
    5  ate container in which the drug  is  sold  or  dispensed  the  name  and
    6  strength  of the drug product and its manufacturer unless the prescriber
    7  specifically states otherwise, AND SHALL ALSO INDICATE THE BRAND NAME OF
    8  THE DRUG PRESCRIBED. The pharmacist shall  record  on  the  prescription
    9  form  the brand name or the name of the manufacturer of the drug product
   10  dispensed.
   11    S 2. This act shall take effect on the thirtieth day  after  it  shall
   12  have become a law.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD08434-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to certain requirements when substitute drug products are dispensed
